page.title: 18Sport in Flint
page.content: {Flint Leisure Centre}is very important to the town. Much unemployment accounts for its extensive use by the public. It was built in 1974 for Â£300 000 and employs 50 people. It makes no profit although 60 000 use the swimming pool annually. As there is no membership system, the Centre is open to one and all. In the main hall there is a great variety of activities such as{Badminton, Netball, Golf, {Hockey, Keep fit, Karate, Yoga,}etc. The Centre includes an excellent {outdoor play area, Squash courts, {Community hall, Sauna, Lounge bar}and many more. Sport is an important pastime in Flint. It boasts a {Football, Rugby and Cricket}team, and is justly proud of Ian Rush the world famous footballer.{Jogging}is popular especially along the dual carriageway.
